full_text:
Re: Reuters: Prison Guards Skipped Mandatory Checks Before Epstein Death
From Hugh Hurwitz
To Ray Ormond,
Date 2019/08/11 09:31
Subject: Re: Reuters: Prison Guards Skipped Mandatory Checks Before Epstein Death
Attachments: TEXT.htm
Sure. Noon is fine, nothing pressing but we can talk anytime you want.
Hugh
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
------- Original message -------
From: (OAG) @usdoj.gov>
Date: 8/11/19 9:29 AM (GMT-05:00)
To: Hugh Hurwitz @bop.gov>
Cc: Ray Ormond @bop.gov>
Subject: Re: Reuters: Prison Guards Skipped Mandatory Checks Before Epstein Death
Gentlemen. Do you have time for a quick update call before I leave for my trip with the AG?
Does 12 noon work?  If there is something new and pressing, we can do a call earlier.
On Aug 10, 2019, at 10:20 PM, Hugh Hurwitz @bop.gov> wrote:
How do they have this info? Unbelievable.
https://www.breitbart.com/politics/2019/08/10/report-prison-guards-skipped-mandatory-checks-before-jeffrey-epsteins-death/
Hugh
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
Page 3251
DOJ-OGR-00024345

text_blocks.content:
Re: Reuters: Prison Guards Skipped Mandatory Checks Before Epstein Death
From Hugh Hurwitz
To Ray Ormond,
Date 2019/08/11 09:31
Subject: Re: Reuters: Prison Guards Skipped Mandatory Checks Before Epstein Death
Attachments: TEXT.htm
Sure. Noon is fine, nothing pressing but we can talk anytime you want.

Hugh
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone

------- Original message -------
From: (OAG) @usdoj.gov>
Date: 8/11/19 9:29 AM (GMT-05:00)
To: Hugh Hurwitz @bop.gov>
Cc: Ray Ormond @bop.gov>
Subject: Re: Reuters: Prison Guards Skipped Mandatory Checks Before Epstein Death

Gentlemen. Do you have time for a quick update call before I leave for my trip with the AG?
Does 12 noon work?  If there is something new and pressing, we can do a call earlier.

On Aug 10, 2019, at 10:20 PM, Hugh Hurwitz @bop.gov> wrote:
How do they have this info? Unbelievable.
https://www.breitbart.com/politics/2019/08/10/report-prison-guards-skipped-mandatory-checks-before-jeffrey-epsteins-death/

Hugh
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone

additional_notes: The document is an email chain discussing the death of Jeffrey Epstein and related news reports. Several email addresses and names are redacted.
